paragraphs.first: Software developer specializing in front-end web development. My main competences are HTML, CSS, Javascript as well as technologies like React and Angular.
paragraphs.second: I have a good knowledge of more low-level javascript concepts like the prototype, closures, the event loop and the DOM. This is because I believe that it is also important to know what is going on "under the hood" of all the modern javascript frameworks
paragraphs.third: I also am competent in css and know more advanced concepts like the box model, selector specificity as well as how to build modern layouts using grid and flexbox.
